casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Guilermo SANTAMARIA, a/k/a William Santamaria, Ghilermo Santamaria, Defendant-Respondent. C-571 September Term 2017
079934 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 09, 2018

**153To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002012-12 having been submitted *1270to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the appellant may serve and file a supplemental brief on or before April 10, 2018, and respondent may serve and file a supplemental brief forty-five (45) days after the filing of **154appellant's supplemental submission, or, if appellant declines to file such a submission, on or before May 25, 2018.
